name: Odyssey (Paranormal)
description:
THIS IS A VR ONLY GAME FOR OCULUS QUEST 2

This project is also incomplete and will consist of bugs

A week after launch things have been going smooth as you finish up your routine your ship comes across a small meteor shower damaging the ship. Now managing your resources you must fix leaks and manage your resource levels. Will you be able to survive this incredible journey or will not make it and deliver the supplies to the colony. 

This project was made in two weeks for the May VR Game Jam made by one person, to be honest, the learning curve for a VR game was something new to me.  Now that I am a bit more familiar with it I feel next time around I can definitely make something a bit more polished.

As for updates 

I don't think I will be continuing this project after the jam maybe one update for bug fixes for this particular project. this was just an introduction to my VR Development and I plan on making a lot more in the near future
